title: Playoff Spots! Get ’Em While They’re Hot (Ep. 207)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Danny Kelly get you set for NFL Week 16 by discussing which Saints defender could further his case for Defensive Player of the Year this weekend (7:29), why the Cowboys' path to the playoffs is more realistic than people think (12:51), how the Rams and Titans ended up as polar opposites (18:18), and how Jimmy Garoppolo could fare in a tough test against the Jags (31:05). Then, the guys give out Fantasy Football Awards, including the “Mr. Won You Your League Award” (35:36), and decide who your draft day crush will be for 2018 (53:20).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
